description:
Using "tox -egenconfig" for generating etc/nova/nova.conf.sample . The resulting file doesn't contain the section for the database options.
Tested with current git master and also with juno stable branch.
title: [database] section missing when generating nova.conf.sample

comments.content:
Using "tox -egenconfig" for generating etc/nova/nova.conf.sample . The resulting file doesn't contain the section for the database options.
Tested with current git master and also with juno stable branch.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~toabctl

comments.content: Looks like this broke during the move to oslo.db and oslo.db wasn't added to tools/config/oslo.config.generator.rc
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/134645
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/134645
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=6859dd61a8472e0cf8f9f4d30f1da7312dc0385d
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 6859dd61a8472e0cf8f9f4d30f1da7312dc0385d
Author: Joe Gordon <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Nov 14 12:57:35 2014 -0800

    Use oslo db concurrency to generate nova.conf.sample
    
    Make sure we include database and concurrency options in the
    sample config file.
    
    Change-Id: I66e68ec120cba2cee86e36aa26720199876c40a4
    Closes-Bug: #1391782
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
